DOC.detailed_description: Objective The objective protocol determine test-retest reliability image technique measure structural functional integrity motor cortex healthy subject . Our goal determine whether measure sufficiently reproducible may use follow disease progression time patient motor neuron disease . A second objective obtain age-matched normative data provide reference value study examine correlation physiological clinical measurement motor function , cognitive testing , plasma spinal fluid biomarker measure disease progression patient motor neuron disease . Study Population 55 neurologically normal , healthy adult , age 35 old Design Each subject undergo several session test . The first testing session consist clinical examination measurement movement speed . Subjects undergo one session transcranial magnetic stimulation brain , one session cognitive testing , three session magnetic resonance imaging brain , one eighteen month apart . Subjects may opt-in collection blood spinal fluid provide control biomarker study motor neuron disease patient . Outcome Measures The primary outcome test-retest reliability magnetic resonance imaging measurement motor cortex individual subject .

Change blood pressure medication within precede week .
